slip_stitch to fasten_off and end with long tail stuff firmly maintaining bend in arm hug monster s right leg 1 work 8 single_crochet into magic_ring 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 16 st 3 *2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 24 st 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 6 decrease 8 times single_crochet in each of next 8 single_crochet to finish round 16 st 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 8 decrease 4 times single_crochet in each of next 8 single_crochet to finish round 12 st 9 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around ch5 tightly for crotch stuff foot firmly stuff leg lightly fasten_off and end with short tail page 3 of 6 © distracted design labs updated 8/1/2014 hug monster s left leg 1 work 8 single_crochet into magic_ring 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 16 st 3 *2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 24 st 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 6 single_crochet in 8 single_crochet decrease 8 times to finish round 16 st 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 8 single_crochet in 8 single_crochet decrease 4 times to finish round 12 st 9 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around single_crochet in next 2st or as many as needed to reach crotch side of left leg 2st do not finish off or cut yarn stuff foot firmly stuff leg lightly joining legs/ making body note make sure legs both face the same way 1 continuing from the monster s left leg single_crochet in each of the back loops of the 5 chain stitches from the right leg 5sc in front 5 single_crochet of right leg 2sc in next single_crochet 6sc in last single_crochet of right leg work single_crochet into each of the remaining loops of the 5 chain stitches 5sc in back 5 single_crochet of left leg 2sc in next single_crochet 6sc to finish round 36st 2 *2sc in next single_crochet single_crochet in next 5sc repeat
